title: VELCRO Brand ECO Collection | Non Adhesive Sew On Tape for Clothes and Fabrics | Cut Strips to Custom Length for Sewing | 15ft x 3/4in Roll, Black
description: "Sew" much easier than buttons, zippers or sps. Let's bring all your sewing projects to a "close". Clothing, costumes and home decor - let's make something origil together. Oh, and did we mention they are made from 70% recycled material? VELCRO Brand Sew On Tape is “sew” much easier than buttons, zippers, or sps. Bring all your sewing projects to a “close.” Clothing, costumes, & home décor; make something origil! Sew that adorable pet costume that they never asked for, prevent wardrobe malfunctions and home décor faux pas, and it’s machine washable so your kid can wear that superhero costume year round. VELCRO Brand Eco Collection offers sustaible solutions for all your projects and organization needs. Eco friendly packaging - packaging made from 100% recycled materials. Environmentally friendly yet strong, sew on tape is made from 70% recycled materials, VELCRO Brand Sew-On fasteners are a strong reliable closure for denim, wool, canvas and other heavy fabrics
